ygData.subject: Re: WEAPONS for my PET
ygData.msgSnippet: OK MAN my questions brought up some good info great! since I am L3 I will try to get a rusty sword for my L4 Pet once I hit 4th, cus from what I heard the L1
ygData.messageBody:
OK MAN my questions brought up some good info great!
since I am L3 I will try to get a rusty sword for my L4 Pet once I hit 4th,
cus from what I heard the L1 spell is pretty worthless . ..
especially at L3 . . . L4 here I come! :-)



----- Original Message -----
From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 2:10 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] WEAPONS for my PET


> From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
>
>
> The short answer is Yes as long as it IS level 16. I believe the
> summoning spell at 16th will sumon a 13th-16th level pet, so chances are
> you'll not get the best one. This especially suck when you hit 18 and 19
> and most of your skels are blue and hard to differentiate.
>
> Malark
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Tony B [mailto:tonyb72@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 1:09 PM
> > To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] WEAPONS for my PET
> >
> >
> > From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
> >
> > that brings up a point i was curious about. does that mean a
> > 16 lvl pet
> > will get dual wield? i cant remember exactly, but i think
> > ive seen a skel
> > with two weapons.
> >
> > belphenor
> >
> >
> > >From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
> > >
> > >You can give a weapon to your pet, but you can not take it
> > back. :o(
> > >I think that pets have the same level of knowledge than a
> > warrior of the
> > >same level. So you can give him any weapon you want, but you
> > must know that
> > >it will be lost for you. So if you have a huge amount of hundreds of
> > >platinum, may be you can waste some dwarven battle axes for
> > your pets. :o)
> > >About dmg, think about your pet as a warrior who maxed his
> > skills. No
> > >weapon
> > >-> hand to hand, weapon -> more dmg (but what about the delay ?)
> > >
> > >Taldir, Teir'Dal in Innoruuk.
> > >
> > >
> > >-----Original Message-----
> > >From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
> > >Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 10:53 AM
> > >To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> > >Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] WEAPONS for my PET
> > >
> > >
> > >Has anyone given any swords or anything to your pets? I
> > was thinking
> > >about
> > >trying to save up for a Mino Axe if you can get the axe back
> > after your
> > >skel
> > >is killed. Otherwise I don't think I will use weapons. Or
> > is it more
> > >damage??
> > >
> > >Any info on weapons for your pets would be GREAT! Thanks!
> > >
> > >-Skel the Gnome (3rd lvl Eci)
> > >
> > >WE NECROS "KNOW THE POWER OF THE DARK SIDE!!" hehe had to
> > say it with THE
> > >MOVIE coming out at midnight . . .
> > >
> > >
